Text: Fxed deposit rates for senior citizens offered by major banks including SBI, PNB, HDFC bank and more. Senior Citizen fixed deposits offer higher interest rates, flexible tenures from 7 days to 10 years, and the option for premature withdrawals or loans. They include nomination facilities, automatic renewals, and tax-saving benefits under Section 80C for 5-year
label: Neutral

Text: The RBI fined Axis Bank ₹1.91 crore and HDFC Bank ₹1 crore for regulatory violations. Axis Bank was penalized for issues including improper customer identification and collateral for loans, while HDFC Bank faced penalties for non-compliance related to interest rates and customer service protocols.
label: Negative
